com.infusion.util.event.groovy
Class GroovyEventBroker

java.lang.Object
  com.infusion.util.event.EventBrokerImpl
      com.infusion.util.event.groovy.GroovyEventBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
EventBroker
public class GroovyEventBroker
extends EventBrokerImpl

An extension of the base event broker class that adds convenience methods for passing closures as parameters.

You can "subscribe" to events, or "publish" events.

Author:
eric
